description: Crews are on site. Expect low pressure or no service east of Route 10. We will update here and on Facebook as repairs progress.
title: Water Main Break near Maple & Birch

description: You may experience intermittent discoloration or reduced pressure. Run cold water for a few minutes if discolored.
title: Routine Hydrant Flushing – September 9–12

description: Final lab results received. The system is safe. Normal usage may resume.
title: Boil Water Advisory Lifted (Chestnut Ridge)
